name: Card Summoners
description:
You are a summoner who recently joined the new Summoner Corps as a wicked summoner has risen among the people. She herself has assembled summoners from all over in attempt to conquer the lands of Chrono. It will weigh on you and the corps to prevent this from happening.

Note this is an extremely early version of the game. No balancing has been done nor have skills been implemented yet. I simply wanted to put out something playable to get past the first step of my nerves on releasing a project after so long. All content is subject to change. Please enjoy.

For feedback head to the discord: https://discord.gg/KcRYaeT
